name: UIWindowScene
desc: A scene that manages one or more windows for your app.

items.name: var windows: [UIWindow]
items.desc: The windows associated with the scene.

items.name: var keyWindow: UIWindow?
items.desc: The key window associated with the scene.

items.name: var screen: UIScreen
items.desc: The screen that displays the contents of the scene.

items.name: var traitCollection: UITraitCollection
items.desc: The traits that describe the current environment of the scene.

items.name: var coordinateSpace: UICoordinateSpace
items.desc: The coordinate space occupied by the scene.

items.name: var interfaceOrientation: UIInterfaceOrientation
items.desc: The orientation to use when displaying content in your windows.

items.name: var sizeRestrictions: UISceneSizeRestrictions?
items.desc: The minimum and maximum size of the app's windows.

items.name: class UISceneSizeRestrictions
items.desc: An object that specifies the minimum and maximum sizes for resizable windows.

items.name: var screenshotService: UIScreenshotService?
items.desc: An object that generates a high-fidelity version of your app's content.

items.name: class UIScreenshotService
items.desc: An object that coordinates the creation of PDF screenshots of an appâ€™s content.

items.name: var statusBarManager: UIStatusBarManager?
items.desc: The current configuration of the status bar.

items.name: class UIStatusBarManager
items.desc: An object that describes the configuration of the status bar.

items.name: var titlebar: UITitlebar?
items.desc: The title bar displayed in a window of a Mac app.

items.name: class UITitlebar
items.desc: An object that you use to configure the title bar of a window in a Mac app built with Mac Catalyst.

items.name: class UIWindowSceneDestructionRequestOptions
items.desc: An object that contains information to use when removing a window scene from your app.

items.name: enum UIWindowScene.DismissalAnimation
items.desc: Constants that indicate the types of animations available for dismissing a scene's windows.

items.name: var activityItemsConfigurationSource: UIActivityItemsConfigurationProviding?
items.desc: An object that can provide shareable items for a scene.
